question_text: What symptoms indicate you might need to use Windows VGA mode?
answer_options: Computer won't power on at all
Screen is black after Windows splash screen disappears
correct_answer: Screen is black after Windows splash screen disappears
explanation: When you can see BIOS messages and Windows splash screen but the screen goes black after Windows loads, it indicates OS display settings are incompatible with your monitor. VGA mode can resolve this compatibility issue.
